en.GMCM.Title.WildFoodEnable.Name: Enable Wild Food
en.GMCM.Options.WildFood.Name: Adds Crops & Forage.
en.GMCM.Options.WildFood.ToolTip: Enables crops and forage focused on edible herbs, fruits, nuts etc. Required for Advanced Difficulty Toggle Below.
en.GMCM.Title.MixedSeedsEnable.Name: Enable Mixed Seeds
en.GMCM.Options.MixedSeeds.Name: Adds Garden Variety Mixed Seeds.
en.GMCM.Options.MixedSeeds.ToolTip: Enables special mixed seeds to be sold by shopkeepers and foraged around the valley; requires the Item Extensions mod.
en.GMCM.Title.PerfectionShipmentEnable.Name: Perfection Toggle
en.GMCM.Options.PerfectionShipment.Name: Adds Items to Perfection.
en.GMCM.Options.PerfectionShipment.ToolTip: Uncheck this if you do not want any of the items from this mod to be needed for the game's perfection requirements.
en.GMCM.Title.CategoryOverrideEnable.Name: Forage Category Overrides
en.GMCM.Options.CategoryOverride.Name: Changes category names.
en.GMCM.Options.CategoryOverride.ToolTip: This changes the categories for items like mushrooms, herbs etc. Purely cosmetic. Requires the mod Calcifer.
en.GMCM.Title.VanillaTweaksEnable.Name: Enable Vanilla Tweaks Compatibility
en.GMCM.Options.VanillaTweaks.Name: VT Style Seeds and Saplings.
en.GMCM.Options.VanillaTweaks.ToolTip: Changes seeds and saplings to match Vanilla Tweaks style.
en.GMCM.Title.EasyRecipesEnable.Name: Change Machine Recipes to Default.
en.GMCM.Options.EasyRecipes.Name: Enables Easy Recipes.
en.GMCM.Options.EasyRecipes.ToolTip: Check this box if you want machine recipes to be known immediately. Otherwise player learns recipes from NPC mail. False by default.
en.GMCM.Title.MachineStyleEnable.Name: Artisan Machine Design Style
en.GMCM.Options.MachineStyle.Name: Choose a Style!
en.GMCM.Options.MachineStyle.ToolTip: Select a visual style for artisanal machines; can choose from Kitchen, Boutique or Market. Defaults to Kitchen.
en.GMCM.Title.MachineColorEnable.Name: Artisan Machine Color Scheme
en.GMCM.Options.MachineColor.Name: Choose a Color!
en.GMCM.Options.MachineColor.ToolTip: Select a color scheme for artisanal machines; can choose from Classic, Cream or Chocolate. Defaults to Classic.
en.GMCM.Options.Boutique.Name: Boutique
en.GMCM.Options.Kitchen.Name: Kitchen
en.GMCM.Options.Market.Name: Market
en.GMCM.Options.Chocolate.Name: Chocolate
en.GMCM.Options.Classic.Name: Classic
en.GMCM.Options.Cream.Name: Cream
en.GMCM.Options.Simple.Name: Simple
en.GMCM.Options.Advanced.Name: Advanced
en.GMCM.Title.ArtisanDifficultyToggle.Name: Artisan Difficulty Setting
en.GMCM.Options.DifficultyToggle.Name: Choose How Crafting Works.
en.GMCM.Options.DifficultyToggle.ToolTip: Choose from Simple or Advanced. Simple is the same as how wine or jelly is handled in the base game; advanced requires multiple inputs to make more valuable, specific items. Requires Wild Food module enabled. Defaults to simple.
en.GMCM.Title.FloristOnlyToggle.Name: Florist Only Toggle
en.GMCM.Options.FloristOnly.Name: Removes Ingredients from WAG.
en.GMCM.Options.FloristOnly.ToolTip: WARNING: ENABLE THIS IF YOU JUST WANT FLORIST OR MAKEUP CATEGORIES ONLY. This will cause errors for all food-related WAG categories if enabled.
en.GMCM.Title.CakesConfig.Name: Cakes
en.GMCM.Options.Cakes.Name: Adds Cake Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Cakes.ToolTip: Adds craftable cakes to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.TinyCakesConfig.Name: Tiny Cakes
en.GMCM.Options.TinyCakes.Name: Adds Cupcake Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.TinyCakes.ToolTip: Adds craftable cupcakes and petit fours to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.MuffinsConfig.Name: Muffins
en.GMCM.Options.Muffins.Name: Adds Muffin Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Muffins.ToolTip: Adds muffins & scones to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.BreadsConfig.Name: Breads
en.GMCM.Options.Breads.Name: Adds Bread Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Breads.ToolTip: Adds breads to the game. Requires Advanced Difficulty. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.DoughnutsConfig.Name: Doughnuts
en.GMCM.Options.Doughnuts.Name: Add Doughnut Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Doughnuts.ToolTip: Adds doughnuts & eclairs to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.CookiesConfig.Name: Cookies
en.GMCM.Options.Cookies.Name: Add Cookie Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Cookies.ToolTip: Adds cookies, macarons & brownies to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.PiesConfig.Name: Pies
en.GMCM.Options.Pies.Name: Add Pie Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Pies.ToolTip: Adds pies and tarts to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.PuddingsConfig.Name: Puddings
en.GMCM.Options.Puddings.Name: Add Pudding Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Puddings.ToolTip: Adds puddings to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.CoffeeToggle.Name: Coffees
en.GMCM.Options.Coffee.Name: Add Coffee Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Coffee.ToolTip: Adds ground coffee, lattes to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.TeaToggle.Name: Teas
en.GMCM.Options.Tea.Name: Add Tea Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Tea.ToolTip: Adds tea sachets, tea, bubble tea, kombucha to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.SmoothieToggle.Name: Smoothies
en.GMCM.Options.Smoothies.Name: Enable Smoothie Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Smoothies.ToolTip: Adds Smoothies to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.LemonadeToggle.Name: Lemonades
en.GMCM.Options.Lemonade.Name: Enable Lemonade Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Lemonade.ToolTip: Adds lemonades to the game. Requires Wild Food for Lemons. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.BouquetToggle.Name: Bouquets
en.GMCM.Options.Bouquets.Name: Enable Bouquets.
en.GMCM.Options.Bouquets.ToolTip: Adds bouquets to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.PerfumeToggle.Name: Perfumes
en.GMCM.Options.Perfume.Name: Enable Perfumes.
en.GMCM.Options.Perfume.ToolTip: Adds perfumes to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.SoapToggle.Name: Soaps
en.GMCM.Options.Soap.Name: Enable Soaps.
en.GMCM.Options.Soap.ToolTip: Adds soaps to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.CandlesToggle.Name: Candles
en.GMCM.Options.Candles.Name: Enable Candles.
en.GMCM.Options.Candles.ToolTip: Adds candles and dried flowers to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.IncenseToggle.Name: Incense
en.GMCM.Options.Incense.Name: Enable Incense.
en.GMCM.Options.Incense.ToolTip: Adds incense and dried flowers to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.MakeupToggle.Name: Makeup
en.GMCM.Options.Makeup.Name: Enable Makeup.
en.GMCM.Options.Makeup.ToolTip: Adds cosmetics to the game. Available Only on Advanced Difficulty.
en.GMCM.Title.AlesToggle.Name: Ales
en.GMCM.Options.Ales.Name: Enable Ales.
en.GMCM.Options.Ales.ToolTip: Enable ales to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.MeadsToggle.Name: Meads
en.GMCM.Options.Meads.Name: Enable Meads.
en.GMCM.Options.Meads.ToolTip: Enable meads to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.LollipopsToggle.Name: Lollipops
en.GMCM.Options.Lollipops.Name: Enable Lollipops.
en.GMCM.Options.Lollipops.ToolTip: Adds lollipops to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.MarshmallowsToggle.Name: Marshmallows
en.GMCM.Options.Marshmallows.Name: Enable Marshmallows.
en.GMCM.Options.Marshmallows.ToolTip: Adds marshmallows to the game. Requires Wild Food for Marsh Mallows. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.ChocolatesToggle.Name: Chocolates
en.GMCM.Options.Chocolates.Name: Enable Chocolate Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Chocolates.ToolTip: Adds chocolate items to the game. Requires Wild Food for Chocolate. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.JellyBeansToggle.Name: Jelly Beans
en.GMCM.Options.JellyBeans.Name: Enable Jelly Beans.
en.GMCM.Options.JellyBeans.ToolTip: Adds jelly beans to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.GumballsToggle.Name: Gumballs
en.GMCM.Options.Gumballs.Name: Enable Gumballs.
en.GMCM.Options.Gumballs.ToolTip: Adds gumballs to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.HardCandiesToggle.Name: Hard Candies
en.GMCM.Options.HardCandies.Name: Enable Hard Candies.
en.GMCM.Options.HardCandies.ToolTip: Adds hard and rock candies to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.FairyFlossToggle.Name: Fairy Floss
en.GMCM.Options.FairyFloss.Name: Enable Fairy Floss.
en.GMCM.Options.FairyFloss.ToolTip: Adds fairy floss to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.IceCreamToggle.Name: Ice Cream
en.GMCM.Options.IceCream.Name: Enable Ice Cream.
en.GMCM.Options.IceCream.ToolTip: Adds ice cream cones to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.PopsiclesToggle.Name: Popsicles
en.GMCM.Options.Popsicles.Name: Enable Popsicles.
en.GMCM.Options.Popsicles.ToolTip: Adds popsicles to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.MilkshakesToggle.Name: Milkshakes
en.GMCM.Options.Milkshakes.Name: Enable Milkshakes.
en.GMCM.Options.Milkshakes.ToolTip: Adds milkshakes to the game. Requires Ice Cream category to also be enabled. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.IceCreamSandwichToggle.Name: Ice Cream Sandwiches
en.GMCM.Options.IceCreamSandwich.Name: Enable Ice Cream Sandwiches.
en.GMCM.Options.IceCreamSandwich.ToolTip: Adds ice cream sandwiches to the game. Requires Advanced Difficulty and Ice Cream category to also be enabled. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.JamsToggle.Name: Jams
en.GMCM.Options.Jams.Name: Enable Jam Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Jams.ToolTip: Adds gourmet jams and jellies to the cooking menu in the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.PicklesToggle.Name: Pickles
en.GMCM.Options.Pickles.Name: Enable Pickle Objects.
en.GMCM.Options.Pickles.ToolTip: Adds gourmet pickles and salsas to the cooking menu in the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.CSAToggle.Name: Packaged Crates & Baskets
en.GMCM.Options.CSA.Name: Enable Packaged Goods.
en.GMCM.Options.CSA.ToolTip: Adds various crates and baskets of items to the game. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.PresentLocations.Name: Make All Locations Available
en.GMCM.Options.PresentLocationsConfig.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.PresentLocationsConfig.Tool: Set to true for secret forage locations to always be present, instead of unlocking them by leveling skills and relationships. Defaults to False.
